1566320.name: Captain Coffer 2D Soundtrack
1566320.description:
The original soundtrack from Captain Coffer 2D in one, convenient package! Includes all stage themes and more. Listen to the songs of the Mystic Castles, Ancient Glade, Industry City, and Paradox Pyramids as composed by Paul Rice.

Take these retro tunes beyond the pixelated kingdoms from within the game, and enjoy the nostalgic rhythms of coconuts and doubloons.
